Frequently Asked Questions

Quick answers to common questions

How quickly do you respond to inquiries?

We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days. For urgent matters, please call us directly.

Do you offer campus visits for college partnerships?

Yes! We regularly visit partner colleges for demos, workshops, and training sessions. Contact our partnerships team to schedule a visit.

Can I schedule a demo of the platform?

We offer personalized demos for individuals, teams, and institutions. Use the contact form above or email us to schedule one.

Do you provide technical support for students?

Yes, we have a dedicated student support team available via email and chat. Pro and Team plan users get priority support.
